body.name: Amazon Fire 7 Kids tablet, ages 3-7. Top-selling 7" kids tablet on Amazon - 2022 | ad-free content with parental controls included, 10-hr battery, 16 GB, Blue

climatePledgeFriendly.details: Reducing CO2 products reduce their carbon footprint year after year. Certified by the Carbon Trust.

features: SAVE UP TO $70 — Get a full-featured tablet (not a toy) for kids ages 3–7, 1 year of Amazon Kids+ content, and a Kid-Proof Case with a built-in stand and save versus purchasing items separately.
2 YEAR WORRY-FREE GUARANTEE INCLUDED — If it breaks, return it and we’ll replace it for free for 2 years.

CONTENT KIDS LOVE — Includes a 1 year subscription of Amazon Kids+: the only service with thousands of ad-free books, games, videos, apps and Alexa skills from brands like Disney, Nickelodeon and PBS Kids. After 1 year, your subscription will automatically renew every month starting at just $4.99/month plus applicable tax. You may cancel any time by visiting the Amazon Parent Dashboard or contacting Customer Service.
SAFETY FIRST — We partner with leading family trust experts to provide a safer digital experience for kids.

NO-HASSLE PARENT CONTROLS — Easy-to-use Parent Dashboard allows you to filter content based on child's age, set educational goals and time limits, and grant access to additional content like Netflix and Disney+.

NOW 30% FASTER — Up to 10 hours of battery for reading, browsing the web, watching videos, and listening to music and enhanced performance—up to 30% faster quad-core processor compared to Fire 7 Kids 9th Generation and 2GB of RAM (double compared to Fire 7 Kids 9th Generation).
NEVER RUN OUT OF SPACE — Choose from 16 GB or 32 GB of internal storage. Add up to 1TB of expandable storage with microSD—more space for downloading favorite content.
STURDY KID PROOF CASE — Every Fire Kids tablet comes with a sturdy Kid-Proof case designed to protect against drops and bumps.
LOVED BY PARENTS — Fire Tablets for Kids have tens of thousands of 5-star ratings.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great beginner tablet
reviews.reviewText: The case makes it safe and durable for young children. Large choice of games for learning, movies and music available for download. Only complaint is processor is slow, but it is adequate for the needs of young children. Different profiles can be set for multiple users.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Son Can’t Put It Down
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my three year old for Christmas and he absolutely loves it. He hasn’t put it down since he got it. I like that I can schedule out time using the Amazon Kids+ app to make sure that he is doing his learning before his play time on his device. I love that the tablet is protected by the case (my son has dropped it several times and not a single scratch, yet). I love the color and that it’s easy for him to use himself. He can place the back stand up and watch his favorite show, Mini Force without having to hold the tablet all the time close to his face. I love that it’s easy to remove the tablet from the case to clean and to put back afterwards. Great purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for toddlers.
reviews.reviewText: Tablet works great. The durable case is even better. Best thing I’ve purchased for small children. Worth the price. Amazon kids free for a year is a plus!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars keeps em occupied
reviews.reviewText: The tablet is great but be aware of content. There are things provided on the tablet that are not kid appropriate. I have removed much of it and blocked things but the tablet keeps getting filled up with data and I have to delete things to free up space often. Parental controls don't always control the setting of sound and screen brightness. Have to reset. Lots of monitoring with device to ensure content is appropriate. Overall it does keep him occupied with games on PBS kids and other sites for kids. Keep Alexa off, not needed. Monitor access to internet and block download capabilities.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Got this tablet for my 4year old to have for road trips. Our 7 year old had got one 3 years ago and it is still working like never before!This tablet is a little smaller than expected but perfect for little hands. I love the case because it is sturdy enough to not break- clumsy toddler has thrown it down the stairs and still working with no scratches or cracks so buy this if you’re hesitant.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’m so impressed with this tablet! My daughter just turned 4 and had a lesser name brand tablet that broke. She didn’t miss a beat with this one and learned how to use it faster and better than I did. I love how long the charge lasts, the durability of case, and the stand/carry handle. Parent controls are very simple too. I will say it was hard to get YouTube kids onto this but I figured it out by watching, well, YouTube (lol). This is so much better than her last tablet and I feel it will last for a very long time. Would highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good price! I bought it before Christmas at half price.
reviews.reviewText: My granddaughter (3) loves this tablet! I don't encourage much screen time, but my granddaughters parents make sure she only gets to play on her tablet for special treat time. She loves the games, and I guess there are a lot of them. Perfect first tablet. And was happy to purchase it at half price before Christmas.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Amazon Tablet is a Saver!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this tablet for my nieces 2nd birthday and omg she loves it. She no longer uses grandma, mom or aunties phone anymore to get her to calm down and worry she will break the phone screen. With this tablet and the case it comes with helps so much. Don't forget to get the screen cover as well it definitely helps maintain/protect the screen. Its easy for her to operate and knows how to get to her apps etc. This has great learning apps and she loves watching that show Ms. Rachel. My sister couldn't ask for anything more.
